alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:56AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana... Cross Bayou At Cross Lake affecting Caddo Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cross Bayou At Cross Lake. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 173.1 feet. - Forecast...The bayou has crested overnight at 173.2 feet and will get back below flood stage later this evening, and then drop below action stage during Monday morning. - Flood stage is 173.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 173.2 feet on 05/01/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1200 PM CDT.
